text: Ara allah ekati upama churamchena -- ekati sahara ya nirapattaya o niscinte chila, era riyeka saba dika theke pracura parimane era kache asata, tarapara allahâ€Œra anugrahabali sanbandhe se akrtajna halo, kaje'i tara ya kare calechila sejan'ya allah take asbadana karalena ksudhara abarana diye o bhaya diye.
